About Me

Hello viewers, I am Shaan Alam. I am a self taught Web Developer, Designer & Programmer. I have been learning Web Development for quite few years. I have the required skills to make interactive, professional websites. Though I am currently in the process of learning Web Development, I have deep knowledge in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Sass, Bootstrap, & JavaScript libraries like React and many more. I am looking forward to learn backend development in JavaScript with Node & Express. I hope that you like my Portfolio site! ðŸ˜„ðŸ˜„

JavaScript Booklist

A very simple JS boolist application. The application was made using the OOP principles of JavaScript. The Project has good use of classes and prototypes.

Created on - 1/1/2020

Published on - 1/1/2020

JavaScript Color Pallette

It's a simple random color pallette made in HTML, CSS, & JS. This application's main purpose was to solve my very own problem to get colors for my Front End Projects. It has features to generate, copy, and save your colors in localStorage. The application is not responsive on mobile devices, but I will try to make it work on mobile devices too very soon!

Created on - 1/1/2020

Published on - 1/1/2020

JavaScript Filterable List

A filterable JS list that filters out your search results while you type in the search box! The results are fetched out from an external API

Created on - 1/1/2020

Published on - 1/1/2020

JavaScript Form Validation

It is a Form Validation App in JS. It has a great UI & User expierence. Modern libraries have been used to make it professional looking Form.

Created on - 1/1/2020

Published on - 1/1/2020

JavaScript Quiz

It is a JavaScript Hollywood quiz application. The questions are fetched from an external API. It also has the features to store your results. The UI is not so good as the main motive was to focus on the JavaScript part.

Created on - 1/1/2020

Published on - 1/1/2020

JavaScript Random Password Generator

It's a Random password generator based on one of Brad Traversy's Tutorial on Youtube. The application generates very strong passwords based on your choices made. You can check out his tutorial here.

Created on - 1/1/2020

Published on - 1/1/2020
